title: Galactica Viper nameplate font
content:
Hi

I was asked to identify this font used in the modern Battlestar Galactica, more specifically in the nameplates of the Vipers. Since my own inquiries produced no results, I'm turning to you for help.

Thanks in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [nameplate.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140524114527/http:/typophile.com/files/nameplate.jpg) | 335.09 KB |
author: LtCannonfodder

comments.content:
The angular cuts remind me of a face I worked on a few years ago called Align but it certainly is not this.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140524114527im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KAT_5277.png)

ChrisL
I imagine this was a custom-made font. There are plenty of fonts inspired by the one used in the show's title, but I haven't been able to find anything like this one.
